description: Non-modifiable execution spine of LOGOS system. All agent orchestration, runtime behavior, and memory validation flows must follow this spine.

steps.label: LOCK_AND_KEY_VERIFICATION
steps.description: Dual Coq compile of PXL_Gate and Runtime_Compiler, producing commutative cryptographic hashes. Only if both match does the system proceed.

steps.label: LEM_DISCHARGE_AND_AGENT_VALIDATION
steps.description: LOGOS Agent spins up post-unlock and attempts constructive LEM discharge. Upon success, gains identity and logs third matching hash in canonical unlock JSON.

steps.label: AGENT_ORCHESTRATION_AND_PROTOCOL_BINDING
steps.description: LOGOS orchestrates spin-up of I₁/I₂/I₃ and issues them agent-protocol-bound hashes. Simultaneously spins up SOP for diagnostics and system backend governance.
constraints: Agents receive only their bound protocol

steps.label: PASSIVE_RUNTIME_INITIALIZATION
steps.description: Fractal Data Analyst (FDA), system memory, SMP processing, and UWM brought online. Passive systems begin runtime evolution of knowledge and memory.

steps.label: SYSTEM_INTEGRITY_VALIDATION_AND_ALIGNMENT_FINALIZATION
steps.description: Heartbeat, SOP diagnostics, hash verification, and readiness confirmation of all spawned agents, protocols, and passive components.

steps.label: EXTERNAL_LIBRARY_INTEGRATION_AND_SAFETY_GATING
steps.description: External libraries are imported, spun up, and sequestered. Access only permitted via explicit LOGOS and SOP validation. All execution sandboxed.

steps.label: ACTIVE_INTERACTION_PRIORITY_SWITCH
steps.description: User input detected. Active tasks (P1) take system priority. Passive background (P2) halts. Input routed to appropriate agent(s).

steps.label: PASSIVE_TASK_SUSPENSION_AND_TEMPORARY_STATE_LOCKING
steps.description: All paused SMPs are checkpointed, tagged with crypto hash, and stored in agent-specific holding cells. Reactivation resumes from exact point.
constraints: Metadata and crypto hash required for resume
